getBoard

public static char[][] getBoard(java.util.List<Ship> ships,
                                java.util.List<ActionResult> actionResults,
                                int width,
                                int height)
Gets the board as a 2D array of chars. The characters stand for: - Ocean: '.' - Boat: 'b' - Hit: 'O' - Sunk: 'S' - Miss: 'X'

Parameters:
ships - the ships
actionResults - the action results
width - the board width
height - the board height
Returns:
the board
